div.p: VersionCode in correspondance messages must be filled in with a valid version key as specified. A correct version code is important, as recipient systems use it to decide which letter type a particular recipient handles. Derived from http://svn.medcom.dk/svn/releases/Standarder/Den%20gode%20korrespondance/XML/Dokumentation/XDIS91.pdf, see 'VersionCode'
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://svn.medcom.dk/svn/releases/Standarder/Den%20gode%20korrespondance/XML/Dokumentation/XDIS91.pdf
Code
Display
XD9134L The version number for MedCom correspondance messages

Derived from http://svn.medcom.dk/svn/releases/Standarder/Den%20gode%20korrespondance/XML/Dokumentation/XDIS91.pdf, see 'VersionCode'
